LanguageData.VGE_TargetingTerminalCanOnlyLinkWithGrav: Targeting terminal can only link with gravship artillery.
LanguageData.VGE_LinkWithTerminalDesc: Select a targeting terminal to link with. A targeting terminal is required to operate gravship artillery.
LanguageData.VGE_UnlinkWithTerminalDesc: Break the current link to a targeting terminal, allowing you to link with a different one.
LanguageData.VGE_SetWorldTargetDesc: Set the target on the world map for the gravship artillery to fire at. Shots fired over the world map are less accurate. Can only fire at revealed locations.
LanguageData.VGE_LinkWithTurretDesc: Select a turret to link with. This targeting terminal will be used to operate that turret.
LanguageData.VGE_UnlinkWithTurretDesc: Break the current link to a turret, allowing you to link with a different turret.
LanguageData.VGE_GravshipArtilleryNeedsVisibleMap: Gravship artillery needs to target a visible, explored map.
LanguageData.VGE_ConfirmCrashLanding:
Landing on this location will be considered a crash. Any highlighted structures underneath the gravship will damage any structures on the gravship in corresponding locations.

The substructure may also become damaged and will need replacing before the next launch.

Some indestructible objects underneath may completely destroy the substructure and any objects on it.

Consider picking a different landing zone.
LanguageData.VGE_CrashLandingWarning: Landing on this location will be considered a crash and will damage the gravship.
LanguageData.VGE_Alert_LowMaintenance_Desc: Some gravship components have low maintenance. This can result in negative launch outcomes and eventual break downs. Consider assigning a colonist to maintain them. Gravship components with low maintenance:\n\n {0}
LanguageData.VGE_OrbitObjectsMultiplierDesc: By default the game will try to keep 3,8,12 or 20 locations in orbit (depending on globe coverage of the planet). With this slider you can apply a multiplier to this number, making your planet orbits super sparse or very cluttered!
LanguageData.VGE_AbsorbGravheatDesc: Flush any remaining structural heat from the grav engine onto this gravheat absorber, allowing for an immediate gravship launch. Gravheat absorber will enter a long cooldown period during which it can't absorb any more heat.
LanguageData.VGE_GravheatAbsorberCoolingDown: Gravheat absorber is cooling down. Available in: {0}
LanguageData.VGE_LaunchHeatsinkCooldownInfo: The heatsinks will reduce the launch cooldown time by {0}.
